name: Ultimate Site Builder by PNX Uin88 for Woocommerce
author: PNX Software Co., Ltd.

sections.description:
UIN88.com：大量Woocommerce+DIVI模板助您快速搭建专业Woocommerce独立网

作为 Woocommerce服务的专业网站，UIN88.com提供大量预置模板，从首页、Shop、Cart, Checkout、Product等所有页面模板的丰富选择，为想要快速建立自己的Woocommerce独立站的用户提供了简单易用而强大的工具。该插件的独特之处在于预置了大量的Woocommece的DIVI模板，为用户提供了多样化的选择，从而在无需耗费大量时间和精力的情况下，帮助您实现专业水平的独立站建设。

不同于传统的网站建设过程，UIN88.com让用户从一个广泛的Woocomerce的DIVI模板库中选择合适的模板，这些模板覆盖了各种行业和风格，包括但不限于时尚、科技、美食、家居等。用户无需从零开始设计和开发网站，而是可直接选择模板，并通过简单的定制工具对其进行个性化修改，快速实现自己的独立站愿景。

UIN88.com集成了DIVI所见即所得的编辑工具，使用户可直观地进行网站编辑。这意味着用户可以轻松地调整布局、更改颜色、添加内容等，而无需具备专业的编码或设计技能。通过简单的拖放操作，用户就可以实现他们的想法，快速打造出一个令人印象深刻的网站。

除了提供预置的模板和直观的编辑工具外，UIN88.com还提供了丰富的功能和选项，以满足用户的个性化需求。用户可以轻松添加各种元素，如滑块、图表、计数器等，以增强网站的交互性和吸引力。此外，插件还具备响应式设计，确保用户的网站在各种设备上都能够完美展示，提供优质的用户体验。

总之，UIN88.com是一个简单而强大的系统，适用于所有想要快速搭建专业Woocommerce独立站的用户。无论您是初学者还是经验丰富的WordPress和Woocommerce用户，都可通过UIN88.com轻松实现自己的独立站梦想。立即下载并体验UIN88.com，让您的电子商务之路更加轻松愉快！

更多详情，请访问https://www.uin88.com
sections.installation:
Requirements

To install Ultimate Site Builder by PNX Uin88 for Woocommerce plugin for your woocommerce store, you need:

  • WordPress Version 5.3 or newer (installed)
  • PHP Version 7.1 or newer

Setup and Configuration

Follow the steps below to connect the plugin to your UIN88 account:

  1. After you have activated the UUltimate Site Builder by PNX Uin88 for Woocommerce Plugin, go to the menu of “Ultimate Site Builder for Woocommerce by PNX Uin88.
  2. Click the 登录 button.
  3. Register an account on uin88.com (free of charge for PayPal login) and login
  4. After the SSO login, you can choose your desired template, download & replace your entire site.
  5. Based on the template, can follow the instruction on uin88.com to configure your Woocommerce site as much as you prefer.
sections.faq:
Does this plugin provide templates for different product types?

Yes you can import the templates for entire site. Based on it, it also provide over 1 thousand template for your site content buildup.

Where can I find the support & document?

The document & support center can be found on https://www.uin88.com.

Does this plugin work with my woo theme?

No. the templates are for your new site builup, not for existing site enhancement.

Does the plugin support test & live mode?

Yes you can import the templates to your stage server for testing.

May I request new features or report bugs?

You are welcome to request new features or report bugs on https://www.uin88.com.
sections.changelog:
2.0.1 – 2024-4-30

  • Enhancement – Improved user experience for the migration process.

2.0.0 – 2024-4-8

  • Enhancement – Improved template list and download process
  • Enhancement – Keep user properties and its restore after template installation

1.0.0 – 2023-5-28

  • Initial release for offline key account usage.
